thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Highly Profitable Advertising Business

title: Highly Profitable Advertising Business
text: Make an Offer looking to sell immediately Asking $500,000 Considering all offers We are offering this complete business for sale at a fraction of what it is worth. Business with web sites and all content. We are the industry leaders in: Ad Management (Ad Server) software and services, Ad Network software and services, Affiliate software and services, Banner Exchange software and services. Purchase of Business includes: Non Disclosure, multiple web sites contents for the business, Contacts (Information and Documentation), Established web sites for software and services, Established domains transferred into your name, Software applications, Source codes, Scripts, Databases, Design and Layout, Logos/Images, Banners/Ads, Support, Hosting (Will transfer in your name) or you can transfer to your own provider. The business and Software applications are listed on every major Search Engine, Directory and Software Directories online. You will also notice permanent listings in Yahoo, Looksmart and DMOZ. The business name alone is the top keyword used during a search. Affordable software solutions that Lower costs, Increase Efficiency and Maximize Revenue. Offering Ad Exchange, Ad Management, Ad Network, Affiliate & Banner Exchange Software. ----
